## Description {#details}

Location of a PHI instruction that is also a debug-info variable value, for the duration of register allocation.

Loaded by the PHI-elimination pass, and emitted as DBG&#95;PHI instructions during VirtRegRewriter, with maintenance applied by intermediate passes that edit registers (such as coalescing and the allocator passes).

Definition at line 584 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.
